body.name: Groove Life Groove Belt Men's Stretch Nylon Belt with Magnetic Aluminum Buckle, Lifetime Coverage
features: Origin Made in the USA and Imported

DESIGN - There’s a reason the Groove Belt is our best selling product. This tactical belt is ultra-comfortable and durable, it’s the perfect everyday belt for hard-working moms and dads, athletes, and weekend warriors. The average person adjusts their belt 5+ times per day, but the Groove Belt only needs to be adjusted one time ever.

MATERIALS - Its signature magnetic clasp also makes this the easiest belt to snap on during your morning hustle and wear all day long without hassle. Our tactical belt began with our proprietary webbing, engineered with just the right amount of stretch to keep you secure, yet comfortable. We then added the world’s best belt buckle that clicks seamlessly into place using rare-earth neodymium magnets set in an A380 aluminum alloy.

SIZING - We’ve made it real easy. Just match your pant size and we’ll do the rest. Check out our sizing guide in the product images for additional details. You can always call our customer service department for more assistance! We would love for you to say hi!

NO BS WARRANTY - Adventure and innovation are at the core of who we are. Groove Life products are driven by those values and are designed for a lifestyle of adventure. In the event you adventure too far, and you feel like your Groove product is not living up to your standards, we’ll do what we can to make it right. Our 94 Year No BS Warranty covers any manufacturing damages to your belt. If it's not our bad, (lost, torn, cosmetic, etc.) we’ll cover that too! Replacement fees and taxes may apply.

BORN IN ALASKA. BUILT IN TENNESSEE - Born in the Alaskan wilderness. Adventure Guide Peter Goodwin realized his lifestyle demanded better gear backed by unbelievable customer service. Groove Life was launched in a freezing garage in Port Alsworth, AK. Five years later, Groove Life employs over 200 people in Tennessee.

Previous page STIFF WITH COMFORT Proprietary webbing, rare earth neodymium magnets and A380 aluminum alloy buckle ADJUST ONCE Designed to have a clean tuck for the belt end, our secure keeper loop has you covered. PREMIUM MATERIALS For the occasional rogue fly away, we’ve added our secure keeper loop. QUICK SNAP BUCKLE In those moments where you need a quick release… we’ve got you covered. Next page 1 STIFF WITH COMFORT 2 ADJUST ONCE 3 PREMIUM MATERIALS 4 QUICK SNAP BUCKLE

What's the strength of the Groove Belt magnet? Is it safe around pace makers, phones, etc? The high strength neodymium magnets are N42 magnets. It is safe for use around your phone. We do not recommend our belt if you have a pacemaker or any other medical device that may be affected by magnetic fields. Will the belt set off metal detectors? Are they TSA approved? Yes, they are subject to setting off metal detectors and are not TSA approved. We advise you to remove your belt and wallet before going through the metal detector. How can I clean or care for my Groove Belt? Mild soap and warm water are all you need for cleaning! We recommend cleaning after a fair amount of wearing just to be sure dirt doesn’t hang around. For the belt, a stain remover pen has also been known to do the trick. What size Groove Belt should I order? Match the belt size you order to your pant size! If you're at the high end or on the cusp of a size, we recommend sticking with the size down. For example, if you're right at 36" or right at 37", we'd recommend ordering a medium.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have been searching for a comfortable belt that could hold up to my job requiring me to be on my feet all day (also climbing ladders and crawling on the ground). I have tried several options and before this belt and this is by far the best I’ve tried. The hooks/magnets have never come undone after about two weeks of wearing it. I have had ratchet belts break open on me or the straps start to sever over time. Because this has a slight stretch material is sort of moves with you and stays in place. Definitely give it a try if you need something durable and comfortable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and Easy to Use
reviews.reviewText: Groove Life's belt is comfortable to wear and extremely easy to buckle and unbuckle. It was also easy to adjust to the correct length. The belt gives enough when wearing it, but also has a firm feel. The buckle does not seem bulky like other adjustable belts. The only negative is the high cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought for my husband- he claims it is the best belt he has had - and has had a lot ! He has a physical job and works 10 hours a day and never had to adjust his pants - you “set it and forget it” - runs true to size , the magnetic closure is ultra strong and easy to use once you get the hang of it - took him a minute to get use to it but now claims he can do it one handed - so just practice a little if it seems weird at first - the belt itself is a very strong material- highly recommended

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product Greater Customer Service
reviews.reviewText: First off I purchased a black belt with black buckle. I’ve been eyeballing the purchase of one of these for a really long time and finally decided to get one after I finished killing off my 3rd leather belt this year.This is a product that every person needs to own. It practically feels like you’re not wearing it and it is unbelievably comfortable. The fastening mechanism is absolutely flawless and the belt has such incredible rigidity with the most perfect amount of stretch. Set this thing up once at your desired size and you can endlessly transfer it to any pair of pants and have the same result every time.The belt buckle is classy and really high quality. I can wear this with my work pants, dress clothes or outdoor gear.I recently purchased a second because I wanted the brown belt with brown buckle to add to my collection. I was sent the incorrect belt and received the brown belt with black buckle. Still a beautiful belt but not what I ordered. I messaged GL and in less than 12 hours they sent me a new belt and told me to enjoy the one I already received at no extra cost. This company has grade A customer service and I’m happy to be a customer and will continue to purchase from them in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was not sure about this belt but the reviews were good and the video shows the versatility of the belt. I have worn Nike golf belts for years with my jeans and casual pants. This is a fantastic belt, fit and style are great. The buckle looks great and is secure and easy to latch. The slight stretch of the belt is also very nice. Try one, you will be pleasantly surprised how great this belt is!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Groove Life Groove Belt - Premium Quality with a Consideration for Investment
reviews.reviewText: Groove Life Groove Belt, and it has truly exceeded my expectations in terms of comfort, durability, and functionality. This men's stretch nylon belt with a magnetic aluminum buckle offers a level of convenience that has made it an integral part of my daily wardrobe.The standout feature of the Groove Belt is its stretch nylon material. The elasticity provides a level of comfort that traditional belts often lack. The flexibility allows for a perfect fit without compromising on ease of movement, making it an ideal choice for various activities, from casual outings to more active pursuits.The magnetic aluminum buckle is not only stylish but also incredibly convenient. The easy on-and-off functionality adds a layer of efficiency to my daily routine. The buckle securely holds the belt in place, and the magnetic closure ensures a snug fit without any compromises on security.The durability of the Groove Belt is evident in its construction. The high-quality materials used make it a robust accessory that stands up well to regular use. The attention to detail in both the belt and buckle ensures that it maintains its integrity over time, contributing to its longevity.The lifetime coverage offered by Groove Life is a testament to the brand's confidence in the belt's durability. Knowing that the manufacturer stands behind their product adds an extra layer of assurance, making the investment in the Groove Belt feel like a smart and reliable choice.While the Groove Belt undoubtedly delivers on its promises of comfort and durability, it's essential to acknowledge that the price point may be higher compared to traditional belts. However, considering the quality, features, and lifetime coverage, the Groove Belt can be seen as an investment in a reliable and long-lasting accessory.In conclusion, the Groove Life Groove Belt is a premium-quality accessory that combines comfort and functionality. While the price may be higher, the overall value, durability, and lifetime coverage make it a worthwhile investment for those seeking a reliable and stylish belt.4.5/5 stars – Premium quality with a consideration for investment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Belt EVER
reviews.reviewText: It works exactly as advertised. The magnet is strong enough that it has never come undone. The elastic is just enough to make it comfortable while still firm enough to not allow my pants to fall. By gear clips nicely to it. Great belt. Since I started using it, i haven't even thought about my other belts. Not only is this belt solid, it goes with just about anything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Belt, very comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I wasn’t sure what to expect when I saw these belts, but I am very happy with it. Fits well and does what it’s supposed to do without being too tight, even has some give to it so that’s it’s comfortable. I was also concerned about the way it buckles, but no more… after wearing it for a couple months, it has never failed to click and stay in place. So much easier than a regular belt.
Ein schlichter, moderner, gut aussehender Gürtel. Der Verschluss hält stabil.Manchmal muss ich den Gürtel neu einstellen, damit er stramm sitzt.
